revision.text: Possibly: The Greek rudiments ; in which all the grammatical difficulties of that language, are adapted to the capacities of children: after the plan of Mr. Ruddiman's Latin rudiments, by James Barclay. (Edinburgh : Printed by Tho. and Wal. Ruddimans. And sold by the Booksellers there, 1754). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/265022883
